body:
As the title says, if you would like, tell us you top 5 or 10 resource packs:

Mine:

1st. Galazy pack by: JustCaptainBadass
2nd. Illuminati pack by: Stimpy
3rd. Scav's 7th Default pack by: Scav
4th. Scavs Big pack by: Scav
5th. Eum3s faithful edit by: Eum3
6th. RainPVP by: RainPVP
7th. Dux hax by: Awarrior Venom (Dont have but in vid looks gewd :P)
8th. My default edit #11 by: me
9th. Huahwi's Defscape Edit by: Huahwi
10th. ToxicwasteII's Defscape Edit #3 by: ItsToxicFinest

:3
